You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesG G] > &gdot;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Gdot;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0120/index.htm U+00120].
  * `&gdot;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0121/index.htm U+00121].
